description:
Dot loves music and wants to check out the newest night club in Kong City.  
Help Dot blink the lights to the music!

puzzles.description: Make Dot do nothing when a voice is heard.

hints.description: Drag out a Do Nothing state. Link the state with a Voice Heard cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot randomly choose to turn on red, yellow, or green lights.

hints.description: Drag out Red, Yellow, and Green lights. Link the states Random Link cues.

puzzles.description: After each colored light, make Dot automatically turn the lights off.

hints.description: Drag out a Lights Off state. Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: After turning the lights off, make Dot instantly return to Start.

hints.description: Link the states with an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot groove to the music. Place Dot near a speaker that is playing music or sing a song into Dot's microphone. Let Dot blink the lights ten times.
puzzles.introduction: Time for Dot to get into the groove!
